reviews.text: Myself husband and 6 yo daughter stayed here for a week in August 2007. We booked direct with thomson ( hotel only) and paid abpout £200 in total !! Room was clean , cleaned daily , fresh towels, bedding aircon which we needed ! small kitchen , tidy shower room excellent value for money. Pool was small but sufficient seeing as we were out most of time , food in resturant was excellent !! both quality and value we ate elsewhere a couple of times but Hermes was best !! def recommend ! Skiathos is lovely too , small , nice beaches and town v cosmopolitan. Standing at the end of the airport runway is an experience !
reviews.title: Excellent and good value !
We cant get enough of the place!
reviews.text: We stayed at Hermes in July 07 and stayed for a week with our 2 teenage kids and a friend of theirs. It was our fourth stay at Hermes and we absolutely love it there. The staff cant do enough for you. The accomodation is always clean and comfortable and what can I say about the food! it is excellent and although we say every year we will eat out in other places we are yet to find a better restaurant than the one at Hermes so we usually end up staying there in the evenings alot of the time.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our kids were young when we first stayed at Hermes and they loved the pool. There is a short walk to a lovely beach which is fantastic for kids and teenagers but also equally there are quieter areas for us adults. We have made many friends at Hermes and we are looking forward to another trip this year hopefully. We thoroughly recommend Hermes to people of all ages, couples and families. You will love it.
reviews.title: Great value apartments
splendid!
reviews.text: We stayed in Skiathos, Hermes during the middle week of August 07 and it was hot (32 - 37C) . The included air con in the room was a godsend and along with the cleanliness of the room and ease to get to local beaches it made for a very enjoyable holiday. The water taxi nearby was a great way to get into Skiathos town and the restuarants that we visited were all of a very good standard. A boat cruise around the island is a nice leisurely way to see everything and if you are more adventurous a day trip to Athens is worth it. I would recommend these apartments and Skiathos as a great relaxing holiday. We are 40- somethings, but it has plenty to offer for all age groups.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just come back from 2 weeks in skiathos, staying at the hermes apartments. The apartments were lovely, probably the best i've stayed in for self catering. They're clean and have everything you need for cooking (however the supermarket is not great so we hardly ever cooked but it was nice to have toast from a proper toaster in the morning!) You also get a free bottle of wine in your room which is always a nice touch!
reviews.title: lovely apartments in good location

reviews.text: We stayed at the Hermes for 1 week at the beginning of September. It is a lovely hotel, clean, friendly, great food. The location is great, you have three beaches to choose from all are really lovely with a taverna on each beach offering traditional Greek food all day. It is easy to get into town by bus but try to avoid traveling between 7 & 8 as they are really busy, but the water taxi is only a 10 min walk and only cost 3 euros it's a much nicer way to travel in to town. The bus back runs late and only takes 10 mins. The hotel is so well located the you can travel to all the other great beaches on the island on the bus taking between 2 and 10 mins. My 2 children aged 6 and 3 had such a wonderful time on this beautiful island everything from the hotel to the tavernas and resturants were really child friendly. The Sea at all the beaches shelves down slowly enough for the children to enjoy swimming or just splashing about and the snorkling was good fun. Everyone we met had a great time at this hotel and i can't recommend it enough the staff are excellent and there were families and couples both young and old. I think you would find it hard to beat this island it is beautiful and the whole island is easily to get around. Alot of Greek people choose to holiday here so i think it speaks for itself. Skiathos town is lovely to travel into in the evening with lots of resturants and bars. The Windmill is a great place to eat with fantastic views.
reviews.title: Lovely Hotel, Beautiful Island

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just returned from one week staying at the Hermes in Skiathos. The apartments are spotless and the air con a godsend. It operates automatically whenever you are in the room and is essential in July and August with temps in the 90's. Food is really good at the taverna/restaurant offering greek food at reasonable prices. The supermarket is handy with everything you would need. The location is ideal for a beach based holiday with easy access into Skiathos Town. There are 3 beaches within easy walking distance but the best in our opinion is Kolios Beach at this time of year. Vrolominmos is too crowded in July/Aug. Getting into town is a problem by bus between 6 and 8 as the buses are full with people returning from Koukinaries Beach. However the Water Taxi is only a 10 min walk away and a good way to get into town for 3 euros. Bus is fine to return before 1.00am. We would recommend staying at the Hermes as good accomodation in a good location.

reviews.title: Fabulous Hermes
reviews.text: Just returned from a brilliant two week holiday at the Hermes apartments,Skiathos. The apartments are self catering and include pretty much everything you need including air con and a safe as standard (at no extra cost). The apartments are kept spotlessly clean and the whole complex appears to have been totally refurbished, it's clean and very well kept. I can't say enough about the friendlness of the staff who go out of their way to make your holiday as relaxing as possible. The complex is situated 500m or so from three beaches two of which are blue flag acredited.

reviews.title: Great Place To Stay
reviews.text: Skiathos itself is a very green island and many of the beaches are fringed with pine trees. It's pretty quiet, although Skiathos town has enough choice of bars and resturants to keep everyone happy.
I recommend a boat trip to the neighbouring islands of Skopolos and Alonissos and to Lalaria beach on Skiathos which is stunning but inaccessable by car.
